title: Federal appeals court judge is accused of bullying her clerks
description: The Legal Accountability Project complaint, which has not been previously reported, states that it is based on conversations with multiple former law clerks.
content: The Legal Accountability Project complaint, which has not been previously reported, states that it is based on conversations with multiple former law clerks.
